heading: Organizations
subHeading: Build your organization from QuantConnect's foundation
content:
An organization is a collection of members that share hardware resources, share access to datasets, and collaborate 
  together to develop projects. Hardware resources are used to run backtests, launch research notebooks, deploy live trading 
  algorithms, and store project data. We offer several organization tiers so you can tailor your team's subscriptions as you 
  grow over time. For the times when you need access to a QuantConnect engineer to help solve development issues, assign support 
  seats among your team. There are several tiers of support seats to match the level of support your team requires.

featureShortDescription.01: Tiers to serve all team sizes
featureShortDescription.03: Share hardware nodes to research and trade
featureShortDescription.06: Quick answers to your organization questions
